Excerpt: We will crush violent crime and give our police the support protection resources and respect that they so dearly deserve

Label: Military Strength
Description: Trump promises to strengthen and modernize the military, including building a missile defense shield around the country.

Label: End Drug Trafficking
Description: Trump promises to impose tariffs on Mexico and China if they continue to allow fentanyl and other drugs to enter the United States.
Excerpt: we're going to tell China that if you continue to send fentol to Mexico or any place else that comes into our country we're going to charge you a 25% tariff on everything you sell into the United States of America

Label: American Manufacturing
Description: Trump promises to bring thousands of factories back to America and implement tariffs to encourage domestic production.

Label: Education Reform
Description: Trump promises to remove critical race theory and transgender policies from schools and promote traditional values.
